Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Controller

Class LobbyManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Controller.LobbyManager
public class LobbyManager extends Object
Manages all the Games available and the Players joining them

  • Method Details

    • createNewGame

      public int createNewGame(int numOfPlayers, Player host) throws NumOfPlayersException
      Creates a new Game given the number of Players, inserts it in the games list and creates a GameController, which will also be added to the list of gameControllers, assigns them a new gameID and updates the nextGameID so that there are no different Game instances with the same gameID
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - number of players allowed in this Game (from 2 to 4)
      Returns:
      the id of the game
      Throws:
      NumOfPlayersException - if the numOfPlayers isn't between 2 and 4

    • createPlayer

      public Player createPlayer(String nickname) throws NicknameTakenException, NullNicknameException
      Create a new player with given nickname if none is already using that name, unless a disconnected player (one present in the players arraylist which isn't playing, but has a color assigned to him) had that name, in which case he reconnects to the game
      Parameters:
      nickname - chosen by the Player
      Returns:
      the initialized Player (or his existing instance if a reconnection occurs)
      Throws:
      NicknameTakenException - when the nickname has been taken
      NullNicknameException - when the name is null or empty

    • joinGame

      public void joinGame(int gameID, Player p) throws NumOfPlayersException, GameNotFoundException
      Method that allows the Player p to join the Game identified by the gameID given
      Parameters:
      gameID - of the Game the Player p tries to join
      p - Player that joins
      Throws:
      NumOfPlayersException - when the Game already reached the set number of players needed
      GameNotFoundException

    • removePrematurelyDeadPlayer

      public void removePrematurelyDeadPlayer(Player p)
      Method that removes a player from the List, called when the Player "isAlive == false" and "HasPlayed == false"
      Parameters:
      p - the Player to remove from the List

    • endAGame

      public void endAGame(Game game)
      Method used to end a Game (and his controller), this method also removes all Players that were playing that Game from the list of all players in the Server (this.players)
      Parameters:
      game - to end

      Returns:

    • getGameController

      public GameController getGameController(int gameID)
      Getter for the GameController of the Game which ID is the parameter gameID
      Parameters:
      gameID - ID of the Game managed by the GameController we want to get
      Returns:
      the GameController that manages the Game with gameID as his ID

    • getGame

      public Game getGame(int hisGameID) throws GameNotFoundException
      Getter of Game from his gameID
      Parameters:
      hisGameID - identifier of the Game it returns
      Returns:
      the Game which ID is gameID
      Throws:
      GameNotFoundException - if there's no game with the given gameID
